creator: Game TechWing
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Wild Wolf Animal Simulator from Animal Games! In this wolf game, you'll take on the role of a virtual life wolf and embark on exciting adventures. Explore the vast open world and hunt for prey, while also taking care of other animal survival and your wolf pack and expanding your territory.

Choose your starry wolf's appearance from a selection of skins and customize individual parts of its body. You'll need to maintain your wolf's life, hunger, thirst, and energy to survive in the wilderness and fight other wolf packs.

Wild Wolf Animal Simulator from Animal Games! Is free game in all wild animal simulators games which is full of animal warfare wildlife animal kingdom animal survival games, the wolf among us, lone wolf,animal sim

There are two different game modes to try out: Hunting mode, where you can search for prey and battle other players, and wolf quest mode, where you team up with other wolves to compete against rival packs.

Experience enhanced graphics and realistic 3D environments, with background effects that reflect the characteristics of each region you explore. You'll feel wolf live and encounter a variety of animals, including bears, elephants, jaguars, and tigers, and use your strategic hunting and battling skills to eliminate your wild animal enemies and expand your territory.

Join the world of wild wolves and discover what it takes to be the ultimate Alpha of your pack in wolf game the wild kingdom!

WOLF CASTOMIZATION

In this wolf simulator free game in all animal simulator games where you can Customize the appearance of the wolf as you like. There are several skins to choose from. You can adjust the magic glow for the wolf. To fine tune the animal, you can also change individual parts of the body which is unique feature from other wolf games.

OPEN WORLD Wolf QUEST

Explore a vast open world filled with forests, farms, mountains, and fields as you embark on a wild hunt. Join various wolf clans and take part in different adventures. In the forests, you will encounter many of your fellow wolves who are in need of your help!

WOLF FIGHTING MODE


Wolf fighting mode is a gameplay mode where players engage in battles as a wolf against other animals or opposing wolf packs. Engage in wolf fighting mode and explore the map with your wolf team while defending against wild animal attacks from creatures such as wild tigers, other wolf packs, cougars, lions, and gorillas.







Wild Wolf Animal Simulator: Wolf Games Feature

Engage in intense battles and search for a mate in offline wolf games.

Play as a fierce wolf, raise a family, and breed adorable cubs.

Survive in the jungle wilderness by fighting for your life.

Explore the world of wolves and encounter three distinct species - mountain, snow, and wild - each with their own unique characteristics.

Embark on thrilling wolf tales and become the alpha of a wild wolf clan.

Experience realistic gameplay with easy-to-use controls in wolf sim.

Enjoy the thrill of a wild wolf simulator and offline animal hunting game.
descriptionShort: Unleash Your Inner Beast and Surviving the wild Predators with Wolves.
title: Wild Wolf Animal Simulator
